name: Monarch Butterfly
description: All Metal Earth butterflies are made of 1 sheet colored models and are rated as “Easy” builds.  The upper (dorsal side) and undersides (ventral side) of the forewings and hindwings are decorated in color.The Monarch Butterfly may be the most familiar North American butterfly, and is considered an iconic pollinator species.  Its wings feature an easily recognizable tawny orange, the veins and margins are black, and there are two series of small white spots in the margins.  The Monarch wingspan averages 8-10cm.
